2 onions medium

1 - bring a bowl and put a little oil after, cut the sausage to the rings and heat it well.

2 - After extracting the sausage from the oil, leave it in a side dish then leave the oil as it is.
 3 - Put the onion cubes, tomatoes and green peppers in the oil until they take the golden color, and spoon them two tablespoons of tomato paste and set them on fire for 5 minutes.

4 - Guest cut the sausage to the tomato and put the salt and black pepper and my heart well

Place the beans in the pan on the low heat, and then raise it until it becomes a rather thick mixture.
 Add salt, lemon juice, chili pepper and a little water, then stir until ingredients are mixed together.
 Add the olive oil to the beans, and let it warm a little with the beans.
 Place the eggs in a side bowl, add salt and a little black pepper, skim the fork well, then pour it over the beans with a good stirring until the eggs are cooked well.
 Cover the pan for three minutes until the eggs are fully maturing.
 Serve the beans with hot scrambled eggs with fresh local bread, some of your family's favorite antipasti, decorate the dish with finely chopped parsley, and a few finely chopped green onions, all of which can be changed - according to family taste.

Cubans of green or red cabbage are finely chopped
 . Two large islands, where they are peeled and sprayed smoothly
 . Six tablespoons of regular mayonnaise, can be increased as desired
 . Six tablespoons of coarse white sugar. A glass of yogurt
 . 2 teaspoons salt, or more as desired
 . A teaspoon of black pepper
 . Tablespoon of white vinegar or apple vinegar, and if vinegar is not available, lemon juice can be used.

It is preferable to use a food processor to crush the cabbage, but if it is not available, be careful to cut it very gently.
 Add the carrots to the soft cabbage, mix well with it.
 Add the amount of sugar to the mixture of vegetables, and move well until the sugar mixed with cabbage and carrots, where it will notice the exit of water from vegetables as a result of sugar.
 Move the vegetables to the strainer, and leave them for at least an hour, to make sure the vegetables are filtered out of the entire water.
 Move the vegetables to a deep, well-sized bowl.
 Mix mayonnaise, yogurt, salt and pepper in addition to vinegar, in a suitable bowl.
 Pour the Mayonnaise mixture into the vegetables and stir well, until all the ingredients are mixed together.
 Cover the container with nylon and place in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes before use.

Large grain of eggplant

 . Vegetable oil (corn oil, sunflower oil) is abundant for frying
 . Salt, to taste. Tahini sauce.

 Ingredients of tahini sauce:
 Half a cup of tahini
 . Four cloves of garlic, mashed
 . A glass of yogurt
 . Two tablespoons of vinegar

Preparation of tahini sauce:
 We put in a deep bowl all of the tahini, yogurt, garlic, vinegar
 . Beat the ingredients using a manual handkerchief for 2 minutes, leaving the pot aside until it is needed
 . Preparation of pans salad:
 Wash both zucchini, eggplant, potatoes, sweet green peppers, lettuce leaves, and peel both eggplant and potatoes.
 Cut eggplant, potatoes, squash, bread into small cubes, and cut lettuce and sweet green peppers into longitudinal strips.
 Sprinkle the eggplant cubes with a little salt and leave them for 15 minutes to get rid of the bitter taste in it, then wash it and half the well.
 Sprinkle the vegetable oil in a deep skillet and place on high heat for a few minutes until the oil is well heated.
 Take the potatoes, and then the bread, zucchini and eggplant, respectively, and each time we take out some vegetable oil and put it on drying paper to get rid of the oil stuck to it.
 Add eggplant, bread, zucchini, potatoes, chickpeas, lemon juice, lettuce, parsley, sweet green peppers, cumin, salt and stir them together with a tablespoon.
 Pour the tahini sauce over the bowl containing the pans.
 Put the salad in a serving dish, sprinkle the dish with lemon slices, and parsley sticks.

Cook the pasta with a pot filled with water on the fire, add a little salt and oil. When the water boils well, add the pasta, and wait until it is well cooked.

Heat the butter in a large saucepan until it becomes light brown.
 Add the meat and brown well. 
 Add the onions. Shallots and fry until they become almost 5 light golden for 5 minutes. Add salt, garlic, green peppers and spices.
 Add the tomato sauce, saffron and orange juice and stir for 2 minutes, then add the broth of boiled meat and leave on fire for an hour and a half until the meat is cooked Add the orange spray Add the rice and leave on fire for 15 minutes or until it is cooked.
 Make an aluminum foil and put it in the middle of the rice. Place a piece of burning charcoal in the middle of the boat with a small piece of butter to make smoke with a lid for only 2 minutes.

3 cups basmati rice
 4 cups and a half of water boiled chicken
 1 teaspoon "teaspoon" salt
 1 teaspoon "teaspoon" cinnamon
 1 teaspoon "tea spoon" Paprika
 1 teaspoon "tsp" spices
 1 tsp "tsp" Optional "chop"

 Chicken mixture: 1 kilo chicken
 One quarter cup of rose water
 1 large onion onion quarters
 2 cloves garlic mashed
 3 lobes love "Hill"
 3 Laurel paper
 2 cinnamon sticks
 2 tsp "teaspoon" salt
 1 teaspoon teaspoon saffron
 1 teaspoon "teaspoon" chopped ginger
 1 teaspoon "tsp" turmeric

Wash the chicken with plenty of water, and leave it in an aside.
 In a small cup, mix the saffron and rose water, and stir them for 5 minutes.
 Put the saffron mixture over the chicken, and place it on the inside and outside.
 In a large pot and on high heat, put a large amount of water and chicken, add onions, garlic, bay leaves, cinnamon, lettuce, ginger and turmeric, and leave on fire for an hour until the chicken is cooked.
 Remove the chicken from the soup, place it in a tray aside, and then half the soup.
 We start to prepare the rice. We wash the rice well, soak it for half an hour, then drain it from the water.
 In a large bowl and on high heat, put the soup until it boils.
 Put the rice in the bowl, add salt, black pepper, cinnamon, spices, paprika and saffron, and stir well until it starts to boil.
 Cover the rice bowl, then heat the fire, and leave for 40 minutes until cooked.
 At that time, put the chicken in a tray and place in a preheated oven until red.
 In a large, flat dish, place the rice and spread the chicken over it.
 We offer yellow rice with hot chicken with hot dukes sauce.

 Saffron is placed in a quarter cup of water, left aside.
 Put the oil in a pot on the fire, add the onion, and stir until it turns brown.
 Add chicken pieces, one after the other and stir until golden color is gained, then lift aside.
 Bring the chicken back into the bowl and add cinnamon, cloves, lettuce, bay leaves, black pepper, spices, salt and turkey pepper.
 Place water until covered, leave on medium heat for 30 minutes until cooked.
 Remove the chicken from the soup, stir in an oven tray, and place in the grill to brown.
 Take the amount of 6 cups of soup, and put in a pot on the fire until boiling.
 Add the rice and saffron mixture, then cover and simmer for 30 minutes until cooked.
 Place the rice in the dish, and place the chicken pieces over it.
 Serve hot with yogurt sauce.

We add the powdered milk and the water and leave it with the water bath with continuous stirring, adding cocoa powder and sugar and stirring the mixture until we have a thick homogeneous mixture, can increase water as needed, provided that the density is not less, And are formed and poured easily.
 A small amount of water is added from time to time until we have a homogeneous mixture of chocolate. 
 Leave to cool slightly with stirring from time to time. We prepare aluminum foil and then pour a small amount of chocolate with a piece of hazelnut or almonds and then close the aluminum sheet, chocolate is formed as desired, where you can prepare in a circular or rectangular or square, with the possibility of using small silicone molds for chocolate, Remove the chocolate from the mold after it has frozen and bonded and wrapped with aluminum foil as desired.

 11/2 cup soft semolina
 1/2 cup of fresh milk
 200 grams butter
 1\4 cup tahini
 2 tbsp turmeric
 3 tbsp baiking powder
 1 cup of sugar
 1/2 cup of fresh milk
 3 \ 4 1 cup water

1. Mix dry ingredients together with flipping.
 2. Add the butter and tahini and mix well.
 3. Add the water and mix well until the mixture becomes soft.
 4. Grease a tray with the tahini and pour the mixture
 5. Brush the pine nuts on the surface.
 6. Bake in a protective oven for 45 minutes.
 7. Then rise from the oven and leave to cool completely and then cut.

A cup of butter
 Cup of condensed milk and local
 3/4 cup brown sugar
 1 teaspoon liquid vanilla
 2 cups flour
 1/2 cup peanut butter
 1/2 cup chocolate granules

1. In the blender, put butter, condensed condensed milk, brown sugar, and peanut butter.
 2. Mix and add the liquid vanilla and continue mixing until you get the right consistency.
 3. Add the flour with mixing until the homogenization is complete.
 4. Add a portion of the chocolate granules to the dough that you have mixed with the mixture and then place them in a tray lined with butter paper.
 5. On the fire in a water bath, put the chocolate beans with the pistachio butter and stir until the mixture is fully dissolved.
 6. Mix the mixture in Chinese and face on the face.
 7. Enter the Chinese refrigerator until it is cool and firm.
 8. Then cut it and its feet.

1 cup flour
 3 tablespoons butter
 1 cup liquid cheese
 1 cup strawberry jam

Mix flour, butter and cheese well.
 Remove the paste with a pinch on the surface of the touch, sprinkled with flour.
 Cut the dough in a circular cut.
 Place the dough in the cake molds and bake in the oven until it is cooked for 30 minutes.
 Stuff the mini tart with the strawberry jam and then her feet.
